pre-wrap;\"\u003eThe pure-play foundry sector grew 29% YoY in Q3 2025, driven by surging AI-related orders and continued policy support in China. \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\u003cli value=\"2\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"white-space: pre-wrap;\"\u003eTSMC captured 72% of the pure-foundry market, supported by its accelerating 3nm ramp, strong 4/5nm utilization from AI GPUs, and expanded CoWoS capacity. \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\u003cli value=\"3\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"white-space: pre-wrap;\"\u003eSamsung held the No. 2 position, though its market share slipped QoQ as yield progress on leading-edge nodes remained gradual. Samsung Foundry is prioritizing yield improvement on its SF2 (2nm) process in an effort to regain competitiveness at the advanced nodes. \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\u003cli value=\"4\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"white-space: pre-wrap;\"\u003eSMIC delivered a record Q3 2025, securing the No. 3 spot by revenue with utilization rising to 95.8%. \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\u003cli value=\"5\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"white-space: pre-wrap;\"\u003eLooking ahead, we expect utilization at advanced nodes and total wafer shipments across major foundries to continue rising into 2026.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\u003c/ul\u003e\u003cp class=\"mb-2 relative\"\u003e\u003cbr\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp class=\"mb-2 relative\"\u003e\u003ci\u003e\u003cem class=\"italic\" style=\"white-space: pre-wrap;\"\u003e(*) Samsung includes foundry service for its internal logic IC business\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/i\u003e\u003cbr\u003e\u003ci\u003e\u003cem class=\"italic\" style=\"white-space: pre-wrap;\"\u003eData on this page is updated every quarter\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/i\u003e\u003cbr\u003e\u003ci\u003e\u003cem class=\"italic\" style=\"white-space: pre-wrap;\"\u003eFor detailed insights on the data, please reach out to us at \u003c/em\u003e\u003c/i\u003e\u003ca href=\"mailto:sales@counterpointresearch.com\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"font-medium text-blue-600 dark:text-blue-500 hover:underline\"\u003e\u003cspan style=\"white-space: pre-wrap;\"\u003esales@counterpointresearch.com\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/a\u003e\u003ci\u003e\u003cem class=\"italic\" style=\"white-space: pre-wrap;\"\u003e.
